page.title: 19LIFE ON A FARM
page.content: { Every morning I get up with my daddy at 6.30, I have a cup of tea, then go outside to{prepare the unit}for the cows to be milked. While dad is milking, I feed the{bull and cows,}as well as my{sheep and lamb.}Then I go and help my mummy, she waters her {hens}while I feed them and collect the {eggs.}Then I go up to Winston to see the cows. When I return home I have my {breakfast}and wait for the taxi to take me to school. It is a two mile journey, but there is no bus service to our farm, so I go by{taxi. When I arrive home after{school}I change. I then water the calves, and feed the bull and cows. After I have completed all my jobs I have my{tea. Before my day is complete I round up the cows for{milking.}I then relax in the evening by watching{television.
